title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Skills: Flipped Learning-Based Programming Laboratory Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Students can independently complete 80% or more of hierarchical programming laboratory tasks based on pre-learning materials provided in a flipped learning environment
Students can achieve an average of 75 points or higher in formative assessments by evaluating their ability to analyze and correct errors in experimental processes
Students cultivate the ability to logically explain algorithm design processes through reflexive questions
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
